column1: What the hell were you thinking?! Everyone just saw that the bully victim in your movie is actually a violent psychopath!
This could kill our box office. People are gonna come after us now, saying we didn't check our facts!

It's your fuckin' movie! Now I'm gonna have to work overtime with Marketing to make sure people still sympathize with our victim! Jesus, just get the fuck out of here! I've gotta go to the bathroom!  Uh oh.
